title: Night Without End (4R79)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If an Elf wins a skirmish, exert that Elf to liberate a site or wound a minion.
Lore:	”'Would that this night would end, and I could have better light for shooting.'”
Rarity:	R
